rules_text:
Trample
{2}{G}{G}: Gatstaf Forsaker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
At the beginning of each upkeep if no spells were cast last turn, transform Wandering Bard.
rules_text2:
Trample
{2}{G}{G}: Wolfir Prowler gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if two or more spells were cast last turn, transform Wandering Werewolf.
